name: Final Fantasy VII - Gaia's Children Intro Demo 1.4
name_original: Final Fantasy VII - Gaia's Children Intro Demo 1.4
description:
FINAL FANTASY VII - GAIA'S CHILDREN INTRO DEMO 1.1

Known Issue's 

 - No cursor in Triple Triad card selection.       

 - Battle skill descriptions with scrolling do not update.                                                                       

- Some materia's use same animations ( to be added at a later date )

Controls

 Z = Confirm    X = Back/Cancel   R= Arrow Help     S = Actor HUD Show                                 A = Hide Actor HUD ( Dungeons Only )

Please report any bugs to me. Thanks and enjoy! KUPO!

Notes:

Updated to 1.1! major bug! genesis battle started to soon. fixed some collisions and map transfers.

Updated to 1.4! fixed intro bug repeating, game crashing chest bug, collisions, adjusted stardust ray abilities and blood fang.
